text: dharm ke vishay mein koee zabaradastee nahin. sahee baat naasamajhee kee baat se alag hokar spasht ho gaee hai. to ab jo koee badhe hue sarakash ko thukara de aur allaah par eemaan lae, usane aisa mazaboot sahaara thaam liya jo kabhee tootanevaala nahin. allaah sab kuchh sunane, jaananevaala hai
